projects.title: NBA Stats Site
projects.description: This is your go to site for NBA player and team analysis. Inspired by ESPN and basketball-reference.com, this site pulls advanced NBA player metrics and displays them in appealing charts to compare year-over-year averages.

projects.title: Airflow Pipeline
projects.description: This is a demo project that showcases airflow integration with airbyte (an open-source data integration tool) and dbt (an open-source data transformation engine). It also includes automated slack alerts and helpful information on Docker containers
